content.text: Hewitt is the former chef of the Bellamy Pirates. Not much else is known about him.
He wears a blue coat and has tan skin. His hair is black and has an angry expression. He also has the number "21" tattooed on the right side of his forehead.
He seems to be loyal to the Bellamy Pirates, and if so, Doflamingo as well.
Hewitt is seen using a sword during him and his crew's fight with the Saruyama Alliance. As a Cook, he must have some form of culinary skill.
At some point in his life he joined Bellamy, and became his cook.
He later helped Bellamy defeat the Saruyama Alliance. Later, he was there when the Bellamy Pirates were informed of Luffy and Zoro's bounties.

After Doflamingo punished Bellamy, Hewitt would travel with the Bellamy Pirates to a Sky Island. It is unknown what became of Hewitt and the rest of the Bellamy Pirates when their captain forfeited his captaincy to join the Donquixote Pirates.
